sentences.en: E . g : The patient was allowed to ambulate in the room.
sentences.cn: 允许病人在屋里走动,ambulance原为战士移动医院现为救护车.

sentences.en: Oh, change your job, such you ambulate more with respect to can organic ambulate.
sentences.cn: 噢, 改换你的工作, 这样你就能有机会多走动走动.

sentences.en: Patients in whom no orthotic was used were encouraged to ambulate immediately following randomization, maintaining "neutral spinal alignment" for 8 weeks.
sentences.cn: 随机分组后，不使用矫形器组的病人即刻被鼓励行走，保持脊椎中立位8周。

sentences.en: The patient was allowed to ambulate in his room.
sentences.cn: 病人被允许在屋里走动.

sentences.en: The patient was allowed to ambulate in the room.

words.tran_cn: 走动的，流动的；可走动的
流动的；走动的；非固定的
[车辆][医] 救护车；战时流动医院

trans.tran_en: to wander about or move from one place to another
